element.name: rpbody
element.sql: SELECT tis.name store, tis.store_id, COUNT(*) chk, SUM(s.amount * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), -1, 1)) tot, SUM(s.discounts_amount * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), 1, -1)) dsc, 0 tot_1, 0 tot_2, 0 chk_1, 0 chk_2 FROM ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_header r INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_footer f USE INDEX (date) ON f.cash_id = r.cash_id AND f.id = r.id AND f.`date` >= DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY) AND f.`date` < CURRENT_DATE() INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_pos tip ON tip.cash_id = r.cash_id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_store tis ON tis.store_id = tip.store_id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_subtotal s ON s.cash_id = r.cash_id AND s.id = r.id WHERE f.result = 0 AND tip.store_id NOT IN (13004,1115001,1115002,1120001,1122001) GROUP BY tis.name UNION ALL SELECT tis.name store, tis.store_id, COUNT(*) chk, SUM(s.amount * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), -1, 1)) tot, SUM(s.discounts_amount * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), 1, -1)) dsc, SUM(IF(f.`date` < DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY), INTERVAL 23 HOUR), s.amount, 0) * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), -1, 1)) tot_1, SUM(IF(f.`date` >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY), INTERVAL 23 HOUR), s.amount, 0) * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), -1, 1)) tot_2, SUM(IF(f.`date` < DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY), INTERVAL 23 HOUR), 1, 0)) chk_1, SUM(IF(f.`date` >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY), INTERVAL 23 HOUR), 1, 0)) chk_2 FROM ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_header r INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_footer f USE INDEX (date) ON f.cash_id = r.cash_id AND f.id = r.id AND f.`date` >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY), INTERVAL 9 HOUR) AND f.`date` < DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR) INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_pos tip ON tip.cash_id = r.cash_id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_store tis ON tis.store_id = tip.store_id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_subtotal s ON s.cash_id = r.cash_id AND s.id = r.id WHERE f.result = 0 AND tip.store_id IN (13004,1115001,1115002,1120001,1122001) GROUP BY tis.name
